name: Eulumdat Formatted Luminaire Data File
summary: An ELD file contains plain text luminaire (light fixture) data formatted for use with DIAL DIALux, a professional lighting planning application. It defines a light fixture's intensity, light distribution curve, size, and number of lamps. The data ELD files contain is saved in DIAL's proprietary Elumudat format.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Rename .eld extension to .ldt , then open in a program that supports LDT files

images.caption: ELD file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.alt: ELD file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
